job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: We are seeking Site Reliability Engineers (also accepting Software Engineers/Developers) for a full time role. If you are looking to be part of a team that is excited about building a suite of services that are enterprise scale for one of the top ranked companies, then keep reading! We're looking for top candidates that can contribute to a top tier team.***FULLY REMOTE***Requirements:Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, other enumerate degree6+ years of Java/Python experience in a professional environmentStrong professional experience in the design and development of pipelines from large databases3 years experience in extract, cluster or classifying high quality features from unstructured dataAbility to design and implement efficient algorithms. Ability to debug, optimize code, an automate routine tasks. No 3rd party candidates, No H1B, or OPT EADPay/Compensation Package:$135K-$175K base salary (depending on experience)$36K-$60K sign on bonus (depending on experience)Full benefitsStock options**IF you are interested and available, please forward your resume to ryan.hughes@comcentric.com or text (970) 773-7230 for immediate consideration.
